header.title: My Projects
header.subtitle: Explore my portfolio of production-ready React Native applications. Each project showcases real-world solutions serving thousands of users with advanced features and optimized performance.

projects.title: Soul33 - Wellness & Meditation App
projects.description: Led end-to-end development of a wellness app serving 15,000+ users with a 4.7 rating. Features real-time group chat with 200+ concurrent sessions, voicemail system with message replies and file sharing, centralized audio playback with offline progress tracking, and background downloads. Enhanced performance by 40% through New React Native Architecture implementation.

features.title: Real-time Group Chat
features.description: Support for 200+ concurrent chat sessions with instant messaging, real-time updates, and seamless synchronization across devices.

features.title: Advanced Voicemail System
features.description: Comprehensive voicemail feature with message replies, multimedia file sharing, and organized inbox management.

features.title: Centralized Audio Playback
features.description: Unified audio player with offline progress tracking, background playback support, and seamless content switching.

features.title: Background Downloads
features.description: Efficient background download management for meditation content with automatic sync and storage optimization.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: 40% performance improvement achieved through New React Native Architecture with faster app startup and smoother animations.

features.title: AWS S3 Integration
features.description: Secure cloud storage integration for media content with optimized CDN delivery and bandwidth management.

projects.title: Yoke App - Social Wellness Platform
projects.description: Developed an Instagram-like Reels feature with advanced video optimization including preloading, caching, and seamless playback. Integrated live streaming with ZegoCloud SDK enabling recording and real-time audience interaction. Built comprehensive creator profiles with optimized tabs and gallery components. Reduced re-renders by 40% on complex UI screens through component memoization and lazy loading.

features.title: Instagram-Style Reels
features.description: Smooth vertical scrolling video feed with advanced preloading, intelligent caching, and seamless playback transitions.

features.title: Live Streaming
features.description: Real-time live streaming powered by ZegoCloud SDK with recording capabilities and interactive audience features.

features.title: Creator Profiles
features.description: Comprehensive creator profile pages with optimized tabs, gallery views, and content organization for enhanced user experience.

features.title: Video Optimization
features.description: Advanced video caching and preloading system ensuring smooth playback and minimal buffering across all network conditions.

features.title: Performance Enhancement
features.description: 40% reduction in re-renders through strategic component memoization, lazy loading, and React optimization techniques.

features.title: Real-time Interaction
features.description: Live audience interaction features including comments, reactions, and engagement metrics during streaming sessions.

projects.title: Co-stack Barva - E-commerce & AR Beauty Platform
projects.description: Developed full-scale e-commerce platform with Shopify API integration for products, cart, authentication, and order management supporting 100+ beauty products. Implemented AR-powered lipstick try-on using Three.js and MediaPipe Face Landmarker for real-time virtual makeup experiences. Built notification system with Firebase Cloud Messaging for 5k+ users.

features.title: Shopify E-commerce Integration
features.description: Complete e-commerce functionality with product catalog, shopping cart, secure authentication, and order management for 100+ beauty products.

features.title: AR Lipstick Try-On
features.description: Revolutionary AR-powered virtual makeup experience using Three.js and MediaPipe Face Landmarker for real-time lipstick visualization.

features.title: Firebase Push Notifications
features.description: Comprehensive notification system with Firebase Cloud Messaging delivering personalized updates to 5,000+ active users.

features.title: Product Catalog Management
features.description: Intuitive product browsing with advanced filtering, search functionality, and detailed product information pages.

features.title: Secure Payment Processing
features.description: Integrated Shopify payment gateway with secure checkout process and multiple payment method support.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Fast image loading with react-native-fast-image and optimized rendering for smooth shopping experience.

projects.title: Culture Max - Interactive Card Game Platform
projects.description: Upgraded React Native from 0.72.4 to 0.81.1, migrating Android from Java to Kotlin and iOS AppDelegate to Swift. Implemented monetization system with sponsor cards, banner ads, and reward vouchers, increasing user engagement by 35%. Built advanced card caching system supporting 1,000+ daily active users with real-time analytics for sponsor clicks and view counts.

features.title: Major React Native Upgrade
features.description: Successfully upgraded from RN 0.72.4 to 0.81.1 with complete migration of Android codebase from Java to Kotlin and iOS AppDelegate to Swift.

features.title: Monetization System
features.description: Comprehensive revenue system featuring sponsor cards, strategic banner ad placements, and reward vouchers driving 35% increase in user engagement.

features.title: Advanced Card Caching
features.description: Intelligent card caching system optimized for 1,000+ daily active users ensuring instant card loading and smooth gameplay.

features.title: Real-time Analytics
features.description: Built-in analytics dashboard tracking sponsor card clicks, view counts, and user engagement metrics in real-time.

features.title: Interactive Card Gameplay
features.description: Engaging card-based game mechanics with smooth animations, touch interactions, and rewarding user experiences.

features.title: Firebase Integration
features.description: Complete Firebase setup for authentication, database, analytics, and push notifications ensuring robust backend support.

projects.title: Netra's - Social Commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed social-commerce app integrating Shopify Storefront API via GraphQL for complete e-commerce functionality including products, cart, checkout, and order management. Engineered TikTok-style short-form video feed with preloading and seamless playback state persistence. Built long-form video player with immersive full-screen experience. Implemented blog and recipe sections with rich HTML rendering and embedded YouTube videos. Enhanced performance with FastImage for cached media loading and Reanimated for smooth transitions.

features.title: GraphQL Shopify Integration
features.description: Complete Shopify Storefront API integration using GraphQL and Apollo Client for products, cart management, secure checkout, and order tracking.

features.title: TikTok-Style Video Feed
features.description: Addictive short-form video feed with intelligent preloading, smooth scrolling, and persistent playback state for seamless user experience.

features.title: Full-Screen Video Player
features.description: Immersive long-form video player with full-screen capabilities, gesture controls, and optimized buffering for quality viewing.

features.title: Content Management System
features.description: Rich blog and recipe sections with HTML rendering, embedded YouTube videos, and engaging content presentation.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Enhanced app performance using FastImage for intelligent media caching and Reanimated for buttery-smooth transitions and animations.

features.title: Social Commerce Features
features.description: Unique blend of social media engagement and e-commerce functionality enabling direct product purchases from video content.

projects.title: Flairish - Dual-App Learning Marketplace
projects.description: Architected and developed two interconnected apps: Flairish (Hobbyist) and FlairWiz (Instructor), connecting learners with instructors through live video sessions. Integrated Zoom Video SDK for real-time video sessions with custom UI and session lifecycle management. Implemented complete In-App Purchase flows for iOS and Android using react-native-iap with transaction verification. Engineered OAuth authentication with Google and Apple Sign-In. Managed 50+ production releases across both platforms.

features.title: Dual-App Architecture
features.description: Two interconnected applications - Flairish for learners and FlairWiz for instructors - creating a complete learning marketplace ecosystem.

features.title: Zoom Video Integration
features.description: Seamless real-time video sessions powered by Zoom Video SDK with custom UI, session controls, and comprehensive lifecycle management.

features.title: In-App Purchases
features.description: Complete IAP implementation for both iOS and Android using react-native-iap with secure transaction verification and receipt validation.

features.title: OAuth Authentication
features.description: Streamlined user onboarding with Google and Apple Sign-In integration ensuring secure and convenient authentication.

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Advanced booking system with scheduling, notifications, reminders, and session history for both students and instructors.

features.title: Production Excellence
features.description: Successfully managed 50+ production releases across both apps with comprehensive testing, CI/CD pipelines, and zero critical bugs.
